Text:
mr mirrormaster..thanks for all your quality uploads, they make life less boring. please i wish to make a request-
Solomon kane(dark horse)-Death's Black Riders and Red Shadows series please...thank you in advance
soletar:Sorry man,but I won't be doing requests 'till 15th october...'cause I simply can't find time...after 15th remind me about this request and I'll do it...no prob
MARAMING SALAMAT! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

thanks mirrormaster "the comics master" for honoring a subject's request....expect my message on 15-10-2011  at exactly 12.01.....i wish u the best with whateva is keeping u occupied....except if it is committing a crime! (TORRENTING isn't a crime , mind u, LOL)
soletar:Lol,no crime involved,usual stuff,job,girlfriend and friends,but unfortunately mostly job...:(
Hey Mirror man, just got signed up, so I wanted to say retroactively "thanks" for all the goodies.
